mapper.select: select shop_seq, shop_name, shop_address, shop_intro, shop_image, shop_start, shop_end, shop_phone, shop_regular, shop_tag, (select avg(review_score) from t_review as b where b.shop_seq=a.shop_seq group by shop_seq ) as avg_review_score, (select count(review_score) from t_review as c where c.shop_seq=a.shop_seq) as count_review from T_HAIRSHOP as a
